summary: Project involves a system with monthly report export (PDF/CSV) functionality with month/year selector, and UI dropdown/list styling adjustments.

existing_features.title: Remove transparency from all dropdown/select lists throughout the application. All dropdown menus, select popover content, and suspended lists must have a fully opaque background (no transparency or backdrop opacity). This applies to all Select, Popover, DropdownMenu, and similar overlay components used across every page and component in the frontend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove transparency from dropdown/suspended lists (make background fully opaque)
